RNS Number : 7949R3i Infrastructure PLC09 November 2021

3i Infrastructure plc (the 'Company')

A copy of the half-yearly report for the six months to 30 September 2021 has been submitted to the National Storage Mechanism and will shortly be available for inspection at https://data.fca.org.uk/#/nsm/nationalstoragemechanism .

A copy of this document is also available via the 3i Infrastructure website at www.3i-infrastructure.com
